Package index

All functions

as.glider()
Convert data to glider format
degreeMinute()
Convert longitude and latitude from a combined degree+minute formula
deleteStartupData()
Delete data for an interval after each power-up event
getNextName()
Find a Deconflicted Variable Name
glider-class glider
A class to hold glider information
gliderDebug()
Print a debugging message
handleGliderFlags()
Handle Flags in glider Objects
navStateCodes()
Possible navState values of a glider object
plot(<glider>)
Plot a glider Object
read.glider()
Read a glider data file
read.glider.netcdf()
Read a glider file in netcdf format
read.glider.netcdf.ioos()
Read a glider file in netcdf IOOS format
read.glider.seaexplorer.raw()
Read Raw SeaExplorer Data
read.glider.slocum.csv()
Read a Slocum Glider File in CSV Format
read.glider.slocum.netcdf()
Read a glider file in a Slocum netcdf format
setGliderFlags()
Set data-quality flags within a glider object
`[[`(<glider>)
Retrieve Part of a glider Object
subset(<glider>)
Subset a glider Object
summary(<glider>)
Summarize a glider Object
swOxygenFrequencyToSaturation()
Convert SBE Oxygen Frequency Value to Oxygen Saturation
swOxygenSolubility()
Compute Oxygen Solubility of Seawater
toCamelCase()
Convert a string from snake_case to camelCase
